rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明同时使用抗抑郁药和他汀类药物可以防止治疗中断《BMC Medicine》杂志最近的一项研究评估了抗抑郁药与他汀类药物联合治疗对英国成年人的现实影响，结果显示与仅使用抗抑郁药治疗相比，停药率较低，但疗效相似。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231112/Study-suggests-concomitant-antidepressant-and-statin-use-could-prevent-treatment-discontinuation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231112/Study-suggests-concomitant-antidepressant-and-statin-use-could-prevent-treatment-discontinuation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8387af9-37d2-44cb-a8da-2b6239a6d419 Sun, 12 Nov 2023 21:24:00 -0500 Study suggests concomitant antidepressant and statin use could prevent treatment discontinuation
澳大利亚研究表明，对主要遗传性疾病进行联合基因组筛查具有成本效益且可挽救健康在 EClinicalMedicine 上发表的一项澳大利亚研究中，研究人员评估了联合基因组筛查计划对年轻人遗传性乳腺癌和卵巢癌、林奇综合征和家族性高胆固醇血症的影响。事实证明，该计划具有成本效益，可以降低医疗保健成本并避免大量健康事件，同时强调需要进一步优化公共医疗保健系统并实现公平获取。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231112/Australian-study-shows-combined-genomic-screening-for-major-hereditary-diseases-is-cost-efficient-and-health- saving.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231112/Australian-study-shows-combined-genomic-screening-for-major-hereditary-diseases-is-cost-efficient-and-health- saving.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36ef2bdb-ca56-402c-a893-fe8bf002dde2 Sun, 12 Nov 2023 21:05:00 -0500 Australian study shows combined genomic screening for major hereditary diseases is cost-effective and health-saving
基因疗法的双刃剑：突破性疗法面临制造和功效研究探讨了基因治疗对各种疾病的进展、挑战和经济影响，包括遗传性血液疾病、CAR-T 细胞治疗的恶性肿瘤以及体内 AAV 载体靶向的疾病。该评论强调了基因疗法的变革潜力，同时承认制造、安全性、有效性和长期耐久性方面的复杂性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231112/Gene-therapys-double-edged-sword-Breakthrough-treatments-face-manufacturing-and-efficacy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231112/Gene-therapys-double-edged-sword-Breakthrough-treatments-face-manufacturing-and-efficacy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9233687d-8072-4362-a7b8-8dde9718f991 Sun, 12 Nov 2023 20:55:00 -0500 Gene therapy's double-edged sword: Breakthrough treatments face manufacturing and efficacy
DZNE 神经科学家获得资助研究神经退行性疾病与心理健康之间的联系阿尔茨海默氏症和帕金森氏症等神经退行性疾病可能与抑郁和焦虑有关。 Sabine Krabbe 博士是 DZNE 波恩基地的神经科学家，她从 Chan Zuckerberg Initiative 获得了 120 万美元，用于了解这些综合症的发病机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231110/DZNE-neuroscientist-receives-grant-to-study-link- Between-neurodogenic-diseases-and-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231110/DZNE-neuroscientist-receives-grant-to-study-link- Between-neurodogenic-diseases-and-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8dce2ba-e968-4e18-85d0-ccfa1cf88d43 Fri, 10 Nov 2023 21:13:00 -0500 DZNE neuroscientist receives grant to study link between neurodegenerative diseases and mental health
小型峰会讨论信息学如何帮助解决气候变化对健康的影响Regenstrief 研究所、国际医学信息学协会 (IMIA)、国际健康科学信息学学会 (IAHSI) 和美国医学信息学协会 (AMIA) 将在 AMIA 2023 年度研讨会上举办小型峰会，讨论信息学如何帮助解决以下问题：气候变化引起的健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231110/Mini-summit-to-address-how-informatics-can-help-resolve-health-effects-of-climate-change.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231110/Mini-summit-to-address-how-informatics-can-help-resolve-health-effects-of-climate-change.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d761a3d0-05de-40c1-aa6f-ceed4693d320 Fri, 10 Nov 2023 21:08:20 -0500
霍华德·迈耶斯 (Howard Meyers) 向 MD 安德森投资 2500 万美元，建立迈耶斯肿瘤护理研究所德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心访客委员会 (BOV) 成员、德克萨斯州达拉斯市的 Howard Meyers 已承诺向德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心提供 2500 万美元，用于建立迈耶斯肿瘤护理研究所。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231110/Howard-Meyers-commits-2425-million-to-MD-Anderson-to-built-Meyers-Institute-for-Oncology-Nursing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231110/Howard-Meyers-commits-2425-million-to-MD-Anderson-to-built-Meyers-Institute-for-Oncology-Nursing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7f756bc-47c0-4a1b-ae06-402cd15fef3f Fri, 10 Nov 2023 21:03:55 -0500 Howard Meyers commits $25 million to MD Anderson to establish Meyers Institute for Oncology Nursing
研究发现性工作与肌肉畸形之间存在显着关联加拿大青少年健康行为研究发表在《性健康》杂志上的一项新研究利用加拿大青少年健康行为研究中超过 900 名加拿大青少年和年轻人的全国样本的数据，发现性工作与肌肉畸形之间存在显着关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231110/Study-finds-significant-associations- Between-sex-work-and-muscle-dysmorphia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231110/Study-finds-significant-associations- Between-sex-work-and-muscle-dysmorphia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9915681c-aed1-4141-8965-2e302b4a9c47 Fri, 10 Nov 2023 20:57:00 -0500 Study finds significant associations between sex work and muscle dysmorphia
研究确定睡眠呼吸暂停与房颤发生之间的联系克利夫兰诊所的新研究发现，睡眠呼吸暂停与房颤（一种常见的心律失常）的发生之间存在联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231110/Study-identizes-link- Between-sleep-apnea-and-development-of-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231110/Study-identizes-link- Between-sleep-apnea-and-development-of-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78330fcf-dc61-49c6-8a66-2c8c596ee7a6 Fri, 10 Nov 2023 20:51:00 -0500 Study identifies link between sleep apnea and development of atrial fibrillation
临床前研究为胰腺癌患者提供了一种有前景的新治疗选择发表在《癌症免疫治疗杂志》上的临床前研究为胰腺癌患者指出了一种有前途的新治疗选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231110/Preclinical-research-points-to-a-promising-new-treatment-option-for-pancreatic-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231110/Preclinical-research-points-to-a-promising-new-treatment-option-for-pancreatic-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b479a249-ee7a-4bae-bd1b-4d6e1ab3abf4 Fri, 10 Nov 2023 20:44:00 -0500 Preclinical research points to a promising new treatment option for pancreatic cancer patients
研究发现，缓解期的 RA 患者应继续使用 TNF 抑制剂以避免复发美国风湿病学会 (ACR) 年会 ACR Convergence 2023 上的一项新研究发现，与停止使用 TNF 抑制剂 (TNFi) 的患者相比，处于持续缓解状态的类风湿性关节炎 (RA) 患者的发作明显增多，且布尔 2.0 缓解率较低。继续治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231110/RA-患者-in-remission-should-continue-TNF-inhibitors-to-avoid-flares-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231110/RA-患者-in-remission-should-continue-TNF-inhibitors-to-avoid-flares-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f80b918a-469a-49e7-b68a-8463db2e8b42 Fri, 10 Nov 2023 20:38:00 -0500 RA patients in remission should continue TNF inhibitors to avoid flares, study finds
